official_title: A bill for the relief of the city of Arnasas Pass, Tex., and the Urban Renewal Agency of the city.

summary.text: Authorizes the release of the city of Aransas Pass, Texas, and the Urban Renewal Agency of the city of Aransas Pass, Texas, from obligations entered into with the Department of Housing and Urban Development.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of the city of Arnasas Pass, Tex., and the Urban Renewal Agency of the city.
